meanings.definition: The quality or state of being snide or sarcastic.
meanings.sent1: Her constant snidenesses made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: I could sense the snidenesses in his tone.
meanings.sent3: The snidenesses in her remarks were not appreciated by the audience.
meanings.sent4: The snidenesses in his words cut deeper than any insult.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the heavy atmosphere of snidenesses.

meanings.definition: Remarks or actions that are snide or sarcastic.
meanings.sent1: His snidenesses towards his colleagues were uncalled for.
meanings.sent2: The snidenesses in her jokes often went unnoticed.
meanings.sent3: Despite his snidenesses, he managed to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her snidenesses were like tiny daggers aimed at my self-esteem.
meanings.sent5: The air was thick with the snidenesses exchanged between them.
